alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Natrona County through 530 PM MDT... At 456 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Emigrant Gap, or 20 miles west of Casper, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Emigrant Gap around 510 PM MDT. Red Butte around 515 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mills, Paradise Valley, Casper, Evansville, Bar Nunn and Homa Hills. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 179 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
